document_data.name: Isimud
document_data.mainbody: '''Isimud''' was the wizard leader of [[the Enclave]] in [[Unther]] in [[1357 DR]].
document_data.History: Isimud was a very old wizard, relying on magical means to move.
document_data.Activities: Isimud was in search of some powerful [[artifact]]s of the [[Old Unther Empire]] in order to prevent them falling into the hands of the god-king [[Gilgeam]] or the cult of [[Tiamat]] or someone worse.
document_data.Personality: Isimud was frustrated that no benign group wanted to try to rule Unther. He was disposable to totally supporting a group of this kind.
